summary: After a highly unusual zombie saves a still-living girl from an attack, the two form a relationship that sets in motion events that might transform the entire lifeless world.
cast: Nicholas Hoult|Teresa Palmer|Analeigh Tipton|Rob Corddry|Dave Franco|John Malkovich|Cory Hardrict|Daniel Rindress-Kay|Vincent Leclerc|Clifford LeDuc-Vaillancourt|Billie Calmeau|Adam Driscoll|Christopher Charles Cavener|Jonathan Dubsky|Alec Bourgeois|Robert Reynolds|Felix Bergeron|Josée Laviolette|Zavier Vaillancourt|John Topor|Aaron Janke|Ayisha Issa|Chimwemwe Miller|Christine Rodriguez|Serge Alain Cambronne|Debbie Wong|Quinn O'Neill|Bineyam Girma|Brent Skagford|Arthur Holden|Raphael Grosz-Harvey|Christian Paul|Qamar Abbas|Abdul Ayoola|Steve Barry|Marcello Bezina|Anne-Sophie Bozon|Justin Bradley|Charles Champagne|Ruth Chiang|Eric Daniel|Daniel DiVenere|Felix Famelart|Tod Fennell|Dawn Ford|Jake Hamilton|Jennifer Herrera|Geneviève Joly-Provost|Max Laferriere|Irma Leong|Keeva Lynk|Angie Medrano|Marlos Moreira|Mizinga Mwinga|Diana Noris|Rochelle Okoye|Jan Pivon|Patrick Sabongui|Warren Scherer|Claudia Tiseo
title: Memorias de un zombie adolescente
